name: Watermelon Mint Smoothie
description: I’m always tossing watermelon with fresh mint, so I decided to see how the two would blend in a smoothie. The result is like a cross between a sweet mint tea and a watermelon agua fresca.
keywords: agave syrup, mint, seedless watermelon, healthy, vegan, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 2 cups, tightly packed, diced seedless watermelon
1 teaspoon sugar, agave syrup or vanilla sugar

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients except the watermelon balls in the blender. Blend until frothy, about one minute. Pour into a glass, and garnish with watermelon balls. Serve right away.
